alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 05 at 3:44PM CST until March 05 at 8:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN UNION...CENTRAL ADAMS...NORTHWESTERN TAYLOR AND SOUTH CENTRAL ADAIR COUNTIES... At 344 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located over Corning, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado near Corning. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Creston and Green Valley Lake. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
